title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 37.7 - Seeking assistance in case of possible physical harm
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 37.7 - Seeking assistance in case of possible physical harm

State Regulations

If a patient is considered to be in danger of physical harm
based on the circumstances of his or her disappearance, e.g., from an outing in
wilderness or at a beach, all possible assistance should be sought to aid in
locating the patient. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
37.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
